items.sentence: I need to go to the drugstore to buy some medicine for Tom.
I not only borrowed money from Tom, but also from his wife.
I think French is the most beautiful language in the world.
Tom doesn\'t know whether he should take on the job or not.
Tom doesn\'t really seem to understand how to run meetings.
Tom can play the harmonica and the guitar at the same time.
Tom decided to snoop around and see what he could find out.
Both of Tom\'s parents passed away when he was quite young.
Tom has been sentenced to three consecutive life sentences.
Tom has lost a lot of weight since the last time I saw him.
